title: Ticket #3734: USE_PID_NAMESPACES and ASSIGN_CPU_AFFINITY do not combine
description:
Since 8.0.0 (not tested with earlier versions), if both 

    ASSIGN_CPU_AFFINITY = True
    USE_PID_NAMESPACES = True

are specified, CPU affinity is NOT set (but PID namespace works)

Both options work correctly when used separately.

This is seen both on 

    condor-8.0.0-133173.x86_64 on CentOS 6.4
    condor-8.1.0-0.2.fc18.x86_64 on Fedora 18
remarks:
2013-Jul-02 09:35:21 by gthain:
The PID Namespaces should work with cgroup cpu share assignment, which is arguably a better approach.
